name: Regulatory authority
text:
GENERAL PROVISIONS
 
Revision Note
 
  This part was designated as part IV by L 2009, c 183, §5, but is redesignated as part III pursuant to §23G-15.
 
         The department may adopt rules, pursuant to chapter 91, necessary to implement this chapter. [L Sp 2008, c 13, pt of §2]
